name: Pixel Sweet Girl
description:
Gameplay

  • Use the left and right arrow keys to force Girl run to collect the ice cream cones.
  • Use the Spacebar key jump to avoid obstacles and run to flag of victory.
  • When game over, there will be a restart button to restart the game and When winning the game, there will be an exit button to go to the menu page.
  • Start Button and Exit Button Use the mouse to click to start and finish the game.

Keypad for playing game

Move right = Right arrow key
Move left = Left arrow key
Jump = Spacebar key

Game Developer
